content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Glad you could make it, Max Müller. Regarding the rental price discussions, let's keep our focus on that aspect only at this moment. As the landlord looking to maximize profits, I have an initial thought in mind. However, feel free to propose your preferred figure first so we can start the negotiation. TERMINATE if you wish to stop the conversation or when we reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
